title: Staff Capacity Development Workshop for Improving ODL Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Small-group project implementation using smartphone-based collaborative tools (KakaoTalk, Google Drive)

learning_goals: Participants can develop course design plans by applying three learning design frameworks suitable for ODL environments
Participants can execute two or more project management techniques (schedule/communication/resource management) for effective communication with stakeholders
Participants can derive one actionable strategy to improve existing courses by analyzing the latest trends in Open and Distance Learning (ODL) theories.

resources: Smartphone-compatible collaboration tools (Google Drive, KakaoTalk group chat)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
